overview: Benito Miquiles and a group of Sateré-Mawé warriors participate in a ritual in preparation for the retaking of a portion of their traditionally occupied territory. The area lies outside the Andirá-Marau Indigenous Land located on the border of Amazonas and Pará states, which has been repeatedly invaded by land grabbers and loggers since it was officially demarcated in 1986.
title: A vacina
